en-GB.summary: The radio station that plays a classic with every byte!
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Solid Radio what song is this?
Alexa, ask Solid Radio for current show
en-GB.name: Solid Radio
en-GB.description: Listening to Solid Radio is only the start with this skill. You can find out what the current song is and even what show is on air. All from the power of your voice.
en-GB.updatesDescription: As it's the initial release of this skill, everything is new.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
The main action is "play Solid Radio". "Now playing" and "current show" give more information on the fly. There's also an occasional, witty "marketing liner" added to the end of any response.

One down side of this skill struggling with understanding Solid Radio rather than a completely different station - Solar Radio. We do try to provide feedback on this one but have had a few complaints, even with the existing TuneIn skill.

The PRS music licence for the Solid Radio can be found at https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ouruQbOBUVxQLOlhVKGjYZBlF7_XkW-b/view?usp=sharing covering webcasting (streaming linear radio).
